form.name: complementary_feeding_for_children_6_to_less_than_9_months_of_age
form.page_subtitle: CWC Counselling: Feeding A Healthy Child > Complementary Feeding For Children 6 – < 9 MONTHS OF AGE

field.name: Continue breastfeeding your child at least 8 times during the day and night
Breastmilk continues to be the most important part of your child’s diet. Breastmilk supplies half of the child’s energy needs from 6 – < 12 months of age
Breastfeed first before giving other foods
